title: Node metadata value disables metadata concealment.
description: If the workload_metadata_config block within node_config is included, the node_metadata attribute should be configured securely. The attribute should be set to SECURE to use metadata concealment, or GKE_METADATA_SERVER if workload identity is enabled. This ensures that the VM metadata is not unnecessarily exposed to pods.

custom.possibleImpact: Metadata that isn't concealed potentially risks leakage of sensitive data
